reviewText: The footage seems old - I think most of it was filmed long before the 2013 release date of this DVD. Disappointed.
Not as good or what I expected. More like a documentary than training video
My students loved this.  It was very informative and visual.
Great. Requested by our high school science department. They are glad to have it.

This is 1 disc & is divided into episodes.

Body in numbers: our life in numbers  (1 episode). This part gives a bunch of totals, such as how much time sleeping in a lifetime, how much food eaten, how many heartbeats, enough breaths to power a plane so far,

Human body: Pushing the limits:
Sight  (1 episode)  interesting

Strength  (1 episode) interesting

The ultimate guide: human body  (1 episode)  haven't seen yet

The body invaders: allergies  (1 episode)  This one tells all about allergies & how sufferers can avoid coming into contact with them, how they cope.  Of course this being Discovery Channel it says nothing about  diet or artificial environments (so - 1 star).
